1.comment: Vontaze Burfict, which led to a Mike Nugent field goal.Burfict, which led to a Mike Nugent field goal.

2.comment: Vontaze Burfict suffered a concussion. His absence was a major reason why Flacco was able to get his act together.   Burfict suffered a concussion. His absence was a major reason why Flacco was able to get his act together.

3.comment: Vontaze Burfict had a frustrating afternoon. He was flagged twice for personal foul penalties, 1 of which was completely bogus. He also had to leave the game temporarily because of an apparent concussion, but he was able to return.

4.comment: Vontaze Burfict was knocked out early with a neck injury. Burfict was knocked out early with a neck injury.

5.comment: Vontaze Burfict, but the Steelers took exception to Burfict celebrating while Bell was down in pain. No matter what side you are on, both teams were extremely hyped for this second meeting. Before the game started, these teams were scuffling and all throughout the game as well.    The drama and importance of this game lost a little of its edge after Andy Dalton broke his thumb on the Bengals' first possession. After Dalton had driven his team deep into the Steelers' territory on their first possession, he made an errant shovel pass that was intercepted by defensive lineman Burfict, but the Steelers took exception to Burfict celebrating while Bell was down in pain. 6.comment: Vontaze Burfict's return. The Bengals simply had no chance against him, as Elliott galloped for 134 yards and 2 touchdowns on 15 carries. He also caught 3 passes for 37 yards. 7.comment: Vontaze Burfict. Dalton then used Burfict. Dalton then used Tyler Boyd (4-66) to turn the give-away into 3 more points and a 29-0 lead. The Eagles finally got on the board as Zach Ertz was wide open in busted coverage for a short touchdown. Bennie Logan forced a fumble from Rex Burkhead, and Philadelphia recovered the ball. Wentz threw into a crowd of defenders, however, and after being juggled around, Shawn Williams corraled the ball for an interception. After a punt, Philadelphia had a 15-play drive that ended with a short touchdown run for Darren Sproles (7-14-1, 6-35). The Bengals got too cute after that, throwing a pass to tackle Jake Fisher, and he fumbled the ball away to Philadelphia. The Eagles were set up close to midfield down 15 with 6 minutes remaining. However, Burfict made a great play to intercept Wentz and slam the door for Cincinnati.    Dalton completed 23-of-31 passes for 332 yards with 2 touchdowns. LaFell led the Bengals in receiving with 5 receptions for 95 yards and a score.    Wentz was 36-of-60 for 308 yards with 1 touchdown and 3 interceptions. Ertz had 9 receptions for 79 yards and a score.    Burfict had a tremendous game with 15 tackles and 2 interceptions. The Bengals' defensive line dominated the Eagles' offensive front. 8.comment: Vontaze Burfict and Vinny Rey were knocked out, and the reason the Bengals have been so much better defensively since the bye has been Burfict's improved play, but still, talk about a double bad beat.    When the Steelers and Bengals meet, there's always a heightened sense of competition and each hit seems to have more impact. The Bengals were the team to strike first with a touchdown, as after Jeremy Hill was stopped 3 times at the goal line, the Bengals went for it on 4.h-and-goal, and Andy Dalton snuck it in to take a 10-3 lead in the first quarter. player_team_score.sentence: Dalton finished 20-of-35 for 265 yards, 2 touchdowns and the lost fumble.

defense_tackle_assists.sentence: Dalton finished 20-of-35 for 265 yards, 2 touchdowns and the lost fumble.

9.comment: Vontaze Burfict was penalized for a late hit and then thrown out of the game several plays later for contacting an official.    Dalton finished 20-of-35 for 265 yards, 2 touchdowns and the lost fumble. Considering that his team barely had the ball, those were solid numbers. Dalton did what he could, and even led an impressive touchdown drive to take the lead in the 4.h quarter, but Tennessee marched back down the field for the decisive score.
